title: Designing Science Education Strategies Based on Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Content design optimized for smartphone-based learning, emphasizing practical application through integration with professionals' work

learning_goals: They can explain the scientific linkages with the 17 SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals).
They can design SDGs educational modules utilizing digital media and participatory strategies.
They can propose SDGs implementation plans within their professional domains (medical/legal/technical).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
